channel.title: Zero Trust Network Access on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Zero Trust Network Access on Open Security Summit

item.title: Zero Trust Network Access Framework
item.description: Session slides About this session It will clearly explain that ZTNA is a framework or a combination of solutions that can help you against if not all at least most of the threats out there like Zero Day Attacks, Malware based attacks, Phishing, Data Loss, & many more.
